title: Protected by the Wolf Prince
description: Inspired by Little Red Riding Hood, a romantic fairy tale retelling...Dear readers, the wrong version of Protected by the Wolf Prince was uploaded to Amazon.Your copy should have 31 chapters and an epilogue, if the version you have received is less than this, you can update your copy for free by going into your content and looking for an update!Please message my page if you have any trouble and my assistant will help trouble shoot with you to get the updated copy.Thank you all for your love and support.
author: Jessica Grayson
